item.title: Retail Traders Optimistic Ahead Of BJ's Wholesale Earnings
item.description: Analysts expect the retail store chain to report a 5.4% increase in second-quarter revenue, its best growth rate since Q4 2024.

item.title: Oil On Track To Snap 2-Week Losing Streak, Prices Tick Up As Russia-Ukraine War Deadlock Persists
item.description: Benchmark Brent crude prices advanced 8 cents to $67.75 per barrel, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate prices rose 0.1% to $63.62 per barrel at 3.04 a...

item.title: Zee Spikes On Short Covering, SEBI Analyst Notes Potential Breakout On Close Above This Level
item.description: A decisive close above ₹130 could open the path to ₹140–145 in the short term, according to the analyst.

item.title: Nasdaq, S&P 500 Futures Stutter As Market Awaits Powell Speech, Trump Announcement — Nvidia Stares At More Losses On Rumored H20 Order Pause
item.description: Stocks moved listlessly across the unchanged line on Thursday as traders digested mixed economic data points.

item.title: China Rapid With AI Rollouts As ByteDance, DeepSeek Unveil New Models: Should US Stalwarts Fear?
item.description: TikTok owner ByteDance and DeepSeek on Thursday announced upgraded AI models.
